name: Carmageddon II Game Data
summary: Learn about .TWT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Carmegeddon II is a car racing and battling game in which players can win races by finishing the course, destroying all their opponents, or killing all the pedestrians present for the race. The Windows version of Carmegeddon II was released in 1998; the macOS version was released in 1999.

The game contains several TWT files. While most players will never need to open or edit these files, modders often enjoy modifying the data TWT files contain. Most commonly, modders extract, edit, and repackage files stored in DATA.twt. These files, listed below, store many of Carmegeddon II's basic settings:

description: A TWT file is a game data file used by Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now. It is a compressed archive that contains game assets or settings. For example, DATA.twt contains several .TXT files, which modders can extract and modify to change Carmegeddon II's settings.

instructions: You can use TWT Unpacker (Windows) to extract the files a TWT file contains. After modifying the files, you can repack them using TWT Packer (Windows).
